forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 19C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 66F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High near 20C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 69F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Rain becoming heavy at times late. Low 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Rain becoming heavy at times late. Low 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 18C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 65F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 21C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 70F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 51F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 63F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 63F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High near 60F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.
